name: autofill
description: 自动填写工时系统 - 前后端统一打包项目

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npm run clean && cd ../backend && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build', {recursive: true, force: true})"

author: jonexu
